remark.en: Course level: zero to basic. Unexcused first class absence will result in a reduction in grade. The lecturer reserves the right to withdraw students absent for the first 2 classes.
remark.ch: 限華語程度為初級之外籍生。一、第一次上課未出席，需事先跟老師請假，否則扣學期總成績。二、前兩週未出席者，老師有權退選該生。

goal.en: "On successful completion of this course, students will be able to 1. build up the ability of expressing the basic Chinese, for example, asking price, guiding direction etc.; 2. understand the dialogues based on text structure; 3. recognize basic characters and realize the general structure of Chinese language."
goal.ch: "修完本課程，學生應能 1. 建立基本中文表達能力，如詢價、問方向等； 2. 聽懂以課文架構為基礎的基本對話； 3. 認識基礎漢字並理解中文語言的基本結構。"

content.en:
-----------------
[※本學期為實體課，不接受遠端上課要求 Physical class only, all students are required to come to class.]
-----------------
Basic life Chinese topics on self-introduction, making friends, and go shopping etc. The exercise and grading focus on class oral *performance. Students are strictly required the preview on text listening and the review *performance.
*Performance here refers
1. oral: tone, grammar, vocabulary using and fluency etc. and
2. character recognition: class ppt slides, exercise sheet etc.
Midterm: Oct. 31
Final: Dec. 26
content.ch:
-----------------
[※本學期為實體課，不接受遠端上課要求 Physical class only, all students are required to come to class.]
-----------------
生活方面的基礎華語：自我介紹、交友、購物等。著重於課堂練習與學生口語表現，嚴格要求課前聽力預習與課後口語複習。
期中評量：10月31日
期末評量：12月26日
